section.title: Generic action
section.para: The generic <action> element can be placed into the action chain, in order to reference Spring beans in other configuration files. This enables you to add special functionality to your test case that will extend the usual actions that were described in the previous chapters.

Using this action reference you can use your own implementation of the Java interface com.consol.citrus.TestAction. The implementation will then be included into the test action chain as any other standard action.
In the example the called referenced beans implementation will clean up the database and execute some custom action implementation.
